title: Getting Started
subtitle: Install Cardity CLI and write your first smart protocol in minutes
description: Get up and running with Cardity in just a few minutes. This guide will walk you through installing the CLI tools, setting up your development environment, and creating your first smart protocol.

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: Install Cardity CLI tools on your system
